function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of COVID-19 due to extensive interviewing and interaction with people from various companies and organizations","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and potential outbreak","Mitigation":"Conducting interviews and interactions remotely, implementing strict health and safety protocols, reducing physical interaction","Technologies":"Remote interview platforms, health monitoring technologies, contact tracing apps","People":"Interviewers, interviewees, employees of companies and organizations","Owner":"Researchers, companies, organizations"},{"Description":"Potential exposure to COVID-19 during extensive literature review and database searching","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and potential outbreak","Mitigation":"Limiting physical presence in public spaces, following health and safety guidelines, conducting research remotely","Technologies":"Online databases, digital research tools, remote access to scholarly resources","People":"Researchers, scholars, public","Owner":"Research institutions, scholarly databases, individuals conducting research"},{"Description":"Unidentified health and safety protocols during interactions with interviewees from various companies and organizations","Impact":"Risk of exposure to COVID-19 and potential spread within the research team","Mitigation":"Establishing clear health and safety guidelines, conducting interactions in controlled environments, implementing regular testing and monitoring","Technologies":"Health screening tools, contact tracing apps, remote health monitoring devices","People":"Research team, interviewees, employees of companies and organizations","Owner":"Research team, companies, organizations"}]}
